body: Ignored everything but the minamida usuke comic. All about minamida.
Too short the Kokonoki's part T_T

@Jou dou: I remember a while back someone mentioned it's by an artist named "Shino" (シノ). 'Shino' is a very common name and has multiple different Japanese names (same sound but different characters). But after a few searches, an artist with that name シノ did come up but they are BL yaoi doujins. After further search, I did find something that this Shino シノ made, they did a story in Comic HOTMiLK Koime Vol 18 ( https://nhentai.net/g/286728/ ).
Did Sadakage also made the Girl with the pony tail in page 276?
God damn, FFS I recognize those Japanese characters but I can't recall the name of the cover artist...
NEED THE NAME OF COVER ARTIST
wtf since when did Kai Hiroyuki do old guys and gangbangs?
